cleaned_text: Locations Summa Health Medical Group Internal Medicine About Bitan Ghosh Bitan Ghosh, M.D., an internal medicine physician, has special Interests in Chronic Disease Management, Acute Illness Care, Comprehensive Physical Exams, Specialized Care for Men and Women, Nutrition & Exercise, and Wellness. She attended medical school at the University of Toledo College of Medicine and completed a residency at the Cleveland Clinic Foundation in Internal Medicine. Expertise Education Cleveland Clinic Foundation Residency, Internal Medicine, 2015 University of Toledo College of Medicine Medical School, 2012 Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit.
